xwikidoc.title: IRC Archive for channel #medsavant on 13 August 2013
xwikidoc.content: <mcupak> has joined #medsavant 06:43 <mcupak> has joined #medsavant 06:43 <sdumitriu> has joined #medsavant 10:02 <sdumitriu1> has joined #medsavant 11:11 <sdumitriu1> has joined #medsavant 11:50 <bvancea> has joined #medsavant 11:50 <sdumitriu1> Hey bvancea 11:50 <sdumitriu1> How was your vacation? 11:50 <bvancea> hey sdumitriu1 11:50 <bvancea> pretty nice, lots of fresh air 11:51 <bvancea> and mountain climbing 11:51 <bvancea> how was the last week for you guys? 11:51 <sdumitriu1> Good 11:52 <sdumitriu1> Went biking (70km in a day) 11:52 <sdumitriu1> Toronto is very bike-friendly 11:53 <sdumitriu1> There are hundreds of kilometers of bike paths 11:53 <sdumitriu1> Bike-only, not just a lane next to cars 11:54 <bvancea> wow, nice 11:54 <bvancea> you've got great stamina 11:57 <bvancea> you all finished with the savant/medsavant release? 11:58 <sdumitriu1> Nope 11:58 <sdumitriu1> Working on the RPM for Savant 12:01 <bvancea> ah, I see 12:01 <bvancea> I've noticed you've sent an email regarding the installers 12:01 <sdumitriu1> Yes 12:01 <sdumitriu1> 3 more mails to send 12:02 <bvancea> I can help with any Linux/Windows installers 12:02 <sdumitriu1> You can start with the .exe and .deb ones 12:02 <sdumitriu1> Build then install 12:02 <sdumitriu1> And uninstall 12:02 <sdumitriu1> I already know uninstalling doesn't work on Windows 12:03 <sdumitriu1> There's a bug in launch4j 12:03 <bvancea> oh, I see 12:04 <bvancea> sure, I'll check it out 12:05 <bvancea> btw, what should I do about the weekly status email? I only managed to work for about half of the last week. 12:06 <sdumitriu1> Send what you did 12:06 <bvancea> ok 16:28 <Jim__> has joined #medsavant 19:19 <Jim__> has joined #medsavant
